keys_v_m_comma_key2:
In this part of the Bottom Rows tutorial, we'll learn the use of `keys` `v` , `m` and `,`.
Position your left index finger on the left groove on the `key`board, and your right index finger and right middle finger on the right groove of the `key`board. The bottom row `keys` will be on level below the home row `keys`. With your index,middle and ring fingers, try to reach the `keys` `v`, `m` and `,`, and try to remember the movement. Look away from the `key`board and feel the grooves with your fingers and try to find them by moving your fingers away.
